title: MY LOADING SCREEN EVERY GAME IS SO SMALL HAVING TO GO INTO SETTINGS AND CHANGE IT EVERY GAME HELP!!!
body: Hey guys i am having big trouble with league when i go into a games loading screen every game the setting goes into windowed mode and it is so small i have to manually go back into settings once loaded into the game and change it how do i keep the settings there for permanant help me!!!!!!!!!

replies.body: Thanks for the help IT WORKED!!!!!!!!!!

Your configuration files might not be saving correctly to our servers, so each time you load up a game that window keeps reverting to some weird random resolution it currently has saved. Let's try manually resetting your config files by going through the following steps:

- Log into the game client
- Navigate to C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\Config
- Delete the file  named **game.cfg** and **persistedsettings.json**
- Go into a practice game and verify that settings have saved properly. 
- Leave game to sync settings
